properties.displayName: Suspicious PowerShell Mailbox Export to Share
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where ProcessCommandLine contains "New-MailboxExportRequest" and ProcessCommandLine contains " -Mailbox " and ProcessCommandLine contains " -FilePath \\\\"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects usage of the powerShell New-MailboxExportRequest Cmdlet to exports a mailbox to a remote or local share, as used in ProxyShell exploitati
